messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Was:Moms doing what they want.. Now: Understanding "...
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/1/03 10:31:42 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... Thanks.. I will.   As a matter of fact, I will right now.. lol Anna had her first real job
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/1/03 10:31:42 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
SandraDodd@... writes:

> You should post about those things more often. It was really interesting.
>
> Sandra
>

Thanks.. I will. As a matter of fact, I will right now.. lol

Anna had her first real "job" tonight.. Well, she has babysat for neices and
nephews plenty of times, but tonight she watched some "non family" kids. A
mother from our play group asked if she would like to watch some children
during Bible Study at thier church. She watched 5 kids, ages 1-6, and she
made $10 for about and and half. She really enjoyed it. Tomorrow she is
going over to one of the parents home to help her for a little while. She is
very excited. I hope this is the start of her 'word of mouth"
recommendations.

Teresa


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
